content: Heartfelt story with unique gameplay and art style
I would consider this an interactive way of learning what is most relevant. Thank you. I hope more are created like this to teach the old ways.
Amazing
Stunning game. A beautiful way to preserve a story and to learn more about a culture

It made me cry call me what you want im all man, but im still a human being with feelings, please keep making games like these please! I will buy ever last game until i go broke! No one should have no negative reviews at all about this game FACTS!
Really enjoyable game! Beautiful graphics, wonderful storytelling, and also educational.
Fun chase game. Winter rules! Some Eskimo language.
Awesome game. Already completed all the levels.
Love it
Love it.
One of the best games out there
Amazing Graphics and Smooth Gameplay

I found this game challenging and rewarding. I watched the cultural insights on YouTube, uploaded by the user name Urr Turr. I live in Barrow and am I√±upiaq, so it was especially an honorable experience to learn and hear stories from people I wouldn't otherwise have been able to, given the new society we survive in.
Good gameplay but Too short story

I liked this game so much it worth spending money on, the graphics look amazing also it support gamepad and implement it very well. **Updated review Unfortunately the game hasn't received any new updates since couple of years ago and it doesn't support any of the new phones aspect ratio like 21:9 or 18:9 which are the standards of phones now in 2019
Thie game's graphics is awesome.StoryLine is fantanstic.Good controls.seriously if you are adventure type, perhaps this game takes the number one spot.
Just wow, this is one of the best, if not The best, game on the play store.
Some sections are almost impossible to pass due, like the Whale Spirit level's swingrope.
‚ô•Ô∏è
Absolutely spectacular game, I'm lost for words.

OH MY GOD!!! This game is spectacular! It gives you a sense of worry, excitement, anger, sadness, and surprise all at the same time! It is so well developed and I really hope you guys make more games like this one! The ending, which really brings everything the girl and the fox spirit has done together in a beautiful circle and does make you cry that this game is finished. I enjoyed this game so much and I hope everyone does as well!
Omg it's a beautiful story I put the game on my yt channel and my subscribers loved the game so great job guysü§óüôÇüëçüíØüíØ

Horrible. On 'Whale Spirit', when i was supposed to swing on the spirit helpers arms, there was only *1* spirit helper. I've seen every playthrough of this chapter I found and on every single on there was TWO spirit helpers. Now i can NEVER EVER get past this level because of yalls damn mistake or whatever. I RESTARTED MY PHONE, EXITED THE GAME THEN RE-ENTERED, but still there was only ONE helper! I hope you FIX THIS SOON. No. I don't HOPE you do. You BETTER fix this game or I'll yEll...
love it
it wont work for me
replyContent: We're sorry that Never Alone is not working properly. Can you please give us more details about your device? It will help us to know what country you are in, and the exact Android version and device model number. You can find this information in Settings: About Phone. This will help us to determine if your device is capable of running the game.

content: I like this game and very interested it is my favorite game for ever
love the adventure/journey
so beautiful! a delight to play
This is one of the most beautiful apps I've ever seen. It is also very engaging and relaxing.
very good story and game would high recommend. would like additional sequal to be made
It is a great app
Game controls where very bad to use on galaxy s5 otherwise a nice story
Pretty dope game.
Very cultural and comfy. Everyone should play.

Gorgeous art and a compelling story that honors the Inuit culture. Every part of this game was crafted with a great amount of love. I enjoyed the cultural insight videos and learning about another culture through this medium. (I did have to take off 1 star because of multiple crashes and having my place often saved at the beginning of a chapter, forcing me to repeat large sections)
This was ok until the fox became a human.

Interesting game but it was too short. I wish it was a little bit longer... And sometimes the joystick controller for movement start acting abnormally for which I have to pause the game and resume it to fix it.. And also if you have sightly old or less powerful device it will burn it and drink battery juice like orange juice
well, so disappointing. the control it's not working perfectly.. make so many glitches.. but i love the story.. and absolutely i played this game until finish.
Amazing!! Worth it!!
Good game. But pacing is not so good. Poor AI, Frustrating controls and Achievements those dont unlock even if you completed the task.
Amazing

I love this game, but I don't know if it's just me that the controls are difficult to get used to. Also that it glitches, lags, and bugs out a lot and I get frustrated when this happens. Overall, I really like this game.
Beautiful game and graphics. Probably the best mobile game I've ever played
Game was really pretty on Shield, but now doesn't work on any of my devices, and I am somewhat frustrated  Nvidia Shield Tablet Asus zen tablet 10 P023

The controls a bit fuzzy at times (notably, they are indeterministically inverting in one of the final escape levels) and unlocking of achievements often only works after revisiting levels several times (still missing four secret achievements even though triggering their events several times already). Nevertheless, a beautifully crafted serious games about Inupuit culture (or an example for good gamification for kids wanting to learn about Inupuit).
I love the game. But please make it compatible with more devices. I can only install it on my Nexus 5. My Nexus 5X and Nextbit Robin are both flagged as incompatible. :(

Was enjoying the game, but now I can't play it on my Honor 8 since updating to Nougat.  Please sort this out and I'll up my stars to 5!   Update = Game can now be installed again on my Nougat Honor 8. Can get back to playing it again. YAY!
replyContent:
Hi Neil, 

That is strange... Can you describe what is happening in an email to support@neveralonegame.com? It will also help us to know what your phones model number is as well. Thanks!

content: Beautiful graphics, worth every penny. Drains your battery like there's no tomorrow though and switching between characters quickly on your smartphone can be tedious.  Should be much more fun on a tablet.
Stupid game cant even get passed the chase science with that guy
Bug: Doesn't save progress. Googling shows many other users affected by this bug and they've been ignored. Unplayable.
Great game. The story, graphics and gameplay make it a wonderful experience. The controls could be better though.

Sloppy controls make it nearly unplayable. Suicidal buddy AI keeps undoing my progress. Plenty of bugs. Requires an internet connection to watch the educational documentary videos which were the point of the game. Completed in less than 3 hours. Looks pretty, but I cannot recommend.
worth every peso! hahaha

When I played the game, it was very laggy. As the fox, I clearly landed nicely on the loony spirit... and next moment, I fall straight to death.  I can't believe I payed for a game that is laggy and provides lousy game experience.

The story telling, graphics, controls, game play, music.. Its all brought together as a formidable combo. I haven't heard n played and most importantly felt any game like this ever before. Worth every penny. The game could have run little longer. But its a hit !!!
Have it on PS4, beautiful and fun to play. One of the very few console quality games on Android, highly recommend!
One of the best adventure game for Android.
I loved the game you guys should make a part 2 of this to continue to see what happens to nuna  and the Fox and nice graphics I really loved this game
A beautiful tale with excellent artwork and graffics!

Fantastic visual game, it tells such a lovely heart warming story. Controls are a little difficult when climbing but i put it down to the limitations of smartphones. I recommend anyone to play this, well done for bringing us a great grame and story.
I think it's a great game but needs more levels because I paid for a weeks worth of a game. Please add more levels and I will rate 5 stars!
Simply beautiful
Edutainment at its finest! This game was fun to play, but also interesting to watch. I learned a lot from the short videos you unlock as you play through.
A beautiful interactive work of art. Genius.x
A great story really fun but, for best results play with a control
Culturally insightful while entertaining. Kids also have fun unlocking the (informative/educational) videos. This game along with Valiant Hearts are formats that I hope to see more of.

I am about to try this mobile version after playing it with my husband on ps4, and I was captivated.  This was the first game that brought me to TEARS because the story is absolutely beautiful so I am so stoked to play this version - I pre-rated it and will only change it if I am unsatisfied but I doubt that very much after playing the full ps4 version.  Beautiful story, graphics, and the fox is just awesome.  I truly cared about the characters - which is a sign of very good story telling.  Thank you.
So amazing. Thank you.
Beautiful game, quite fun. And interesting to learn a story from another culture. Would recommend!

Good platform-documentary, but compatibility list should be revisioned, had to manually move installation files from my phone to my tablet to play it on the bigger screen. Bad compatibility list is the best way to encourage piracy. Play Games cloud save would be appreciated too.
replyContent:
Hi Alessandro, 

Thanks all of your input! We will consider adding cloud save in the future!

content: This game is so amazing with great storyline by the indigenous people, graphics so sweet plus the characters. One thing for sure is the moving control was struggling but other than that I was great.
Best game ever made for mobile phone

The controls are hard to use even on a 5 inch device, so be prepared to be interrupted constantly in your progress by bad steering of the game's two characters. This gets pretty frustrating by the end of the game. Other than that it's worth playing this small game as it explores the culture of the Inuit nicely and features astonishing graphics.
Nice graphics, great story. It's a game and a documentary about the ice people. Just great product.
I finished it but didn't give me "the old ways" achievement.
I can tell it would've been a great game but I tried to install it after it said my devise was compatible, then it said that it wasn't so I just want my refund now

Beautiful graphics and cute story. The videos explaining the inupiat culture are quite interesting. The game itself isn't very challenging, though. There's a limit to the amount of things to be solved by jumping and shooting.
Beautiful game.fun playing and educating
nice and relaxing
Beautiful game tho. Had to uninstall for now to save space. Will have to complete later.
Great game but there's a glich/lag on the level Whale Spirit. Can you please fix it.

Love the game. What a deal to get it in just 10 INR. Update: The graphics is really the strongest part of the game. The controls are just so bad I had to uninstall at the last stage of the game. Very frustrating.

The game runs very well on my S6 Edge+. This is most definitely one of the best games I have ever played. It has a similar feel to little inferno, the kind of game you just want to curl up with by the fire. The sounds and visuals are way better than I had expected, and the story is incredible. I feel like I am living a life as a lost Eskimo with a cute little pet fox when I play this game. I highly recommend it to anybody who wants to have a fun, and adorable gaming experience. Kind regards -Adrian
This game is near perfect! Beautiful art and story. Great for kids! Works great on SHIELD with a controller.
Best of all time that I played in android!! Tells a story! Not just colorized copy-cat visual effects. Excited to hear a new game from developer
4 stars. Given because game tends to lag. Also, the controls tend to lag as well.
The game, music and graphics are great but you will die lots and lots of times due to the controls but it's still worth perseverance in my opinion.

Fun game, but laggy framerate and controls at times which leads to some frustrating platforming.  Started noticing this especially in the whale area / swimming sequence.  Using a Nexus 6p, and I would've thought that would be enough for this based on performance of other games with more complex visuals.
This is awesome, graphics are phenomenal on the S7 Edge, can't put it down
Great game overall. Control is a bit sluggish. A few physics bugs here and there. Puzzles are all somewhat similar. Gameplay is a bit short.
The story is interesting and u can learn something from each scene. But it always crashes pls help :( and its so laggy the fps is low :(
In real life, the girl would have slaughtered the fox, ate its meat and wore its skin!
It is a very beautiful platformer, with frustrating controls, and a back story that I wish was not there.
Story, graphics, audio, Everything is perfect.
Perfect game !!!
The artwork, story and character is nice but touch control is suck, it freeze many time and sometime ruin the mood to play this game, please fix it...
Wonderful action platformer...Good graphics.... stellar gamepad controls... Delightful story book adventure game ...
Works really well on the s7.
This game is fine with Nexus 5. But how in earth it is incompatible with Nexus 7 2013. Don't know how to score the game then.
Nice history and great art but the controls need improvements, it's killing the experience of the player.
Beautiful but it is hard to get back to the same spot you stop playing.
So pretty and awesome.
The controls are responsive enough for an enjoyable experience
Loved it. Graphics and story is awesome.

Cool graphics and a superb story, keep you interested. Could have been better though, should include multiple utilities with the player (one Bola for everything?) and controls, a definite let down. Overall, will recommend definitely!

I love the voice of the storyteller, love the motions of the animals, love it all so far. Only one thing bugs me:  The exaggerated vignette effect, I understand why it is used (isolation, draw the player in) but I think a good vignette effect is evident without being so obvious. The visuals are beautiful, don't hide them to much!

Such a great game! I wish it kept going on and on and on. Beautiful story and graphics. I enjoy adventure games. And this one exceeded my expectations. Great job! ‚ù§Ô∏è They need to make a movie on this game!
The Best

Maybe it's related to the device you play this game on, I  use a GALAXY tab S2, but the controls are terrible when quick action is needed. Climbing walls etc has become frustrating and kills the fun of the otherwise nicely designed game. Graphics are it's strongest point.Perhaps a ps4 is a better choice to play it. Lowered score to 1 star, as you move further in the game it just gets worse to control the fox and girl. The fun should be to find out what to do, not to try 80+ times to make a jump before you succeed. Maybe it's not compatible with some 8 inch tablets.
Difficult to play enough that it seriously affects gameplay
Beautiful
An amazing game. Beautiful and fun with challenges. I only wish it was longer.
Few glitches here and there and minor control issues. But the story is really good and it offers great cultural insight.
Its a good game
All around great game. Flawless gameplay for me on and off android. Great job dev.
The story is OK I guess but the default controls are trash

Without a doubt one of best optimized games on Android, with probably best controller/gamepad support I've seen on Android - keep up the good work so big studios can learn from you. Game itself is good, has nice story, atmosphere and responsive controls. Pretty easy though.
I can't often play adventure games but this one is wonderful. Plus it teaches the player about Inuit culture through short films which is cool. Beautiful graphics.
Needs support for Zte Axon 7
Visually captivating
Very informing and interesting
Every time the intro story finishes, the app just exits out to my home screen, and restarts from the beginning when I go to open it again.
Nice platformer, puzzles not too strenuous, but gorgeously done graphics
looks and feels absolutely amazing, one of the best games out there

First off, I have to say the visuals are beautiful. There's a great feeling of isolation when playing this due to the sound affects and visuals. It's quite a unique game, blending basic game play mechanics and puzzles with an educational story line about a tribe. I really enjoyed learning about them and the way the videos tie in with the storyline is fantastic. I've given this 4 stars because I feel a bit more could have been done with puzzles etc. Not a huge variety of things to do. All in all a great game
But it becomes unplayable during the swim whale spirit level i really would like to continue the game please fix the problem i have no other apps running in the background on s7 edge running 6.0.1.
I loved the game but often the movements of the players glitched
I'm using a 8-bit game pad that doesn't have a analog stick. A simple d-pad control looks like it should work but does not. Over all game is cute.

The story is awesome. And the setting and ambiance are really cool, how they're woven into a real, intricate culture. The controls were a little rough, but I still made it through. Overall enjoyed it a lot.
Fell in love with this first on my PS4 and I am now enjoying it on my phone too! Easy controls,good fun.

Just finished the game. Overall good for its price point in mobile. Graphics is good but AI and controls are both clumsy. Great story but gameplay is too short. I loved the fox but too bad they had to replace it with a spirit mascot. Used shield k1+controller, no game breaking bugs encountered yet.
I was really enjoying the game but as soon as I hit the swim level it gets sooooo bad. Note pro 12.2,  getting refund.
replyContent:
Hi Frederico! 

Sorry to see you you go! Did you have any other apps open while you were playing? That can impact the performance of the device.
Would you mind sending an email to support@neveralonegame.com and tell us what you were seeing?  Hope you'll check out our next game. 

Thanks!

content: Hard to see what is happening.
Not compatible with half my devices, No HTC One A9 and Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro 10.1, surely both should be able to play it. ..!!
replyContent:
Hi Jay! 

Thank you for your interest in Never Alone: Ki Edition!

We limited the release to devices we had tested personally or had strong confidence that it would deliver an ideal gameplay experience. The game requires relatively powerful hardware in order to run, which is why only half of your devices are listed as supported. Thanks for playing!

content: I LOVE IT
I'm stuck with the fox and ki, in a cave with the polar bear, I'm suppose to put that fox under a ledge the polar bear keeps killing it , so frustrating!!
replyContent:
Hi Dana, 

Sorry to hear you are having trouble with Never Alone: Ki Edition. You need to move Fox there then away to distract the Bear away from Nuna. If you need more help, we'd be happy to assist you via email at  support@neveralonegame.com

Thank you for playing!

content: Best and greatest Android game ever!
Lovely graphics but I cannot play this game.  Literally. Too many glitches. Sticky controls.  yuck

replyContent:
Hi Dzianis, 

Thank you for your support! We are working on patches to solve the control issues!

content: The story and the play is so gorgeous and engaging and unlike nothing seen before. Where it falls down are the controls. The are frustratingly twitchy especially where timing is important. As you progress this becomes more apparent as the action ramps. Ultimately I never completed since it became too difficult. There is a limit to how often I repetitively drown. Pity as I'd really like to know how it ends! I never finished the videos either since downloads kept locking up. This could have been an A+ title.
replyContent:
Hi there! Thanks for playing Never Alone: Ki Edition! 

Can you give us more information about your video issues in an email to  support@neveralonegame.com?

content: I downloaded this for my neice to play on my tablet. This game isn't tablet compatiable. Fine. Then i try to let her play on my mobile & your app refuses to work without accessing my personal photos, media & files. WHY do you need access to my photos and files? You have no right you creeps! I'm so angry I wasted money on a game I can't even open.
replyContent:
Hi Anthea, 

Thank you for buying Never Alone: Ki Edition! The permission's text is scary, but all it does is give us access phone's hard drive to install the game. We cannot see them. I hope that clears things up! 

You can request a refund from Google Play here: 
https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2479637?hl=en

content: Awesome story

Very good game, the story is fun and exciting to play! I'd give it 5 stars except the controls can be very glitchy and delayed, which is frustrating for a game very timing dependent. It's also quite a short game, but still fun :)
Got the pc version on steam and have to get this on android.
I didn't have any lag on my controls
Very cool graphics and story line but... Controls to play are glitches and bad design.

This game is stunning! I love the art style, both the regular style and the scrimshaw art is amazing. I myself am actually an inupiaq and I think this game does an excellent job of showing our culture. The story is lovely and the game mechanics are fun! I LOVE that it is narrated by a master storyteller! This game is incredible. My only complaint is that the controls are a little clunky but the game is still amazing!

An absorbing, classy game with great graphics. I was loving it until I reached the polar bear den. I knew what I had to do but the controls were so erratic  for getting the fox to climb/jump the wall 3 times that I gave up and deleted.
Amazing graphics. It's also really cute, and I wish my life was like this.....sortta........anyway get this game!
Simply beautiful
It is cute thanks for adding more hint stuff for swinging in the future
love the game, beautiful scenery and cool levels, but the only problem is that the jump button lags pretty badly on some levels, so it takes me ages and many deaths to get through
replyContent:
Hi Tianne, 

Thanks for the review! We will look into the jump button lag! Thanks for playing!

content: Wish more were like this. Loved it despite the controls were a little clunky. The story made up for it though. It made me cry üòä
If you loved limbo, you'll love this. Very similar vibe and game play
Thanks for making the best game even better..

I first played this game on Xbox One. I loved it then and I love it now. The story, the graphics, the mini documentary that plays alongside the games story...it all works well. I'm playing it on my Galaxy Tab S2 with Marshmallow 6.0.1 & it plays flawlessly. This is the Ki Edition which I believe contains the expansion levels I never got to play, so I'm excited to finish this adventure again. Thank you for the port.
I would've given it a 5 stars but the lags are ruining it for me.
replyContent: Hi there! Thanks for playing Never Alone: Ki Edition! Can you give us more information about your issues or email us at support@neveralonegame.com?

content: This game is beautiful and serine.  Well done. I loved it on my Ps4 so I had to rebuy it for Android.
I love to play this game
Beautiful game and story, and I loved watching the videos of the local community!
I loved this game so much on PC that I bought it again on Android!
